newsitem.title: USA: Hyatt to launch $1-bln purchase, expansion plan.
newsitem.headline: Hyatt to launch $1-bln purchase, expansion plan.

text.p: Hyatt Hotels Corp said Monday it will spend $1 billion over the next three years to acquire between 20 and 30 hotels and resorts in the United States, Canada and the Caribbean.

Owned by Chicago's Pritzker family, Hyatt said the acquisition program follows a recent reorganization of various Pritzker-owned real estate interests in Hyatt hotels. The family recently formed Hyatt Equities L.L.C., a real estate acquisition company, which has a portfolio of 32 hotels.

Being a private company, Hyatt Equities will be able to use a much broader range of transaction structures than is typically available to public companie, real estate investment trusts or acquisition funds, the company said.
Hyatt Hotels and its Hyatt International unit operates 176 hotels and resorts in more than 35 countries.
